entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter is described as falling like a marionette whose strings were cut. He is also mentioned as climbing the steps and forcing the door open with his wand.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is described as screaming from the upper floor, trapped, but sensible. She is also mentioned as trying to barricade herself in and having no wand.

relationships.description: James Potter has knowledge of Hermione Granger's situation, as he can hear her screaming and knows she is trapped.
James Potter interacts with Hermione Granger by forcing the door open and talking to her.
